name: Sexy Futa: Mecha Battles of Islands
storyline: Every 100 years, a futa warrior appears on the islands of Shizuyaki province, who must pass difficult tests and subjugate the islanders. In this he is opposed by anime girls, who are the guardians of these islands. In return, futa will receive the power of battle robots and the favor of the most beautiful anime girls, who will be ready to do any order.
summary: Sexy Futa: Mecha Battles of Islands is a role-playing game where you can choose a mecha, customize its appearance to your liking and engage in battle with huge fighting machines in danger-filled locations. Get ready for uncompromising confrontation!
